channel.title: How can I fix my economy?
channel.description: I may use an economy booster, but if I did, how can I get people to start making cash and buying stuff after I clear it?

item.title: How can I fix my economy?
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“chassy13, post:4, topic:249482”]Yes, but Reaper, you may want a small starter, such as 100 gp, a sword, some tools, etc.[/quote]You must not have understood what i said…

Starters are for L7’s. :rolleyes:

tonypker13:

Just make sure you don’t give everyone on the server the chance to get and do whatever they want.

Read full topic
item.source: How can I fix my economy?

item.title: How can I fix my economy?
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:3, topic:249482”]btw:

Hey Tony! I like the things you code! Hey Tony! If I could I would be you! The one and only coder with the one and only codes! You know how to take a wL server, and make it great! Tony’s scripts are more than good… They’re g-rrrreat!

really? lol…[/quote]

@ X screech X: Make it somewhat difficult to earn things, I took out all rares except for 2, and will give away little of them on holidays.
Just make sure you don’t give everyone on the server the chance to get and do whatever they want.

Read full topic

item.title: How can I fix my economy?
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

Just make it so that you can’t buy a ton of shit from the shops. Like rare shops… It completely defeats the purpose of rares?

start off with a bronze like chassy said, but if you’re just focusing on economy, you should probably look at your exp rate. If people are getting to like 99 str, and 99 def but they can’t afford the armor for their combat it’s sort of rediculous.

Don’t make a starter, starters are for squares.

Make items hard to get i suppose. Idk, i feel like im just repeating chassy, I mean he explained it pretty well. Just don’t make items easy to get.

btw:

X Screech X:

Hey Tony! I like the things you code! Hey Tony! If I could I would be you! The one and only coder with the one and only codes! You know how to take a wL server, and make it great! Tony’s scripts are more than good… They’re g-rrrreat!

really? lol…

Read full topic
item.source: How can I fix my economy?

item.title: How can I fix my economy?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Make it so you only start with something like Iron, then you must get stuff from monsters or skills. Make Prices so they arent very high, search Google for an runescape item.cfg, etc. Make monsters drop maybe a few gp, then when players get a higher level, they may buy something better. Dont put items that aren’t usually in shops, make a general store with some tools, and usually just kinda make it like RuneScape’s old days.

Read full topic
item.source: How can I fix my economy?
